Recent News

First in-person meeting

speakers:Bart van Ginkel, Tom van der Beek and Amey Vasulkar
when:16 September 2021 at 16:00
where:Zoom

In this meeting we gave a short introduction to the PhD Forum with what we do and where we stand in the numerous forums and councils at TU Delft. Following this, we discussed the results of the questionnaire and got to know more about your fellow PhDs. In this discussion, we also introduced the new PhDs who started during the pandemic. Later, as promised, we went for free drinks and bites at the /Pub in the basement of our faculty.

The tentative schedule for the meeting is as follows:

16:00 Introduction to PhD Forum and the next meeting

16:10 Discussion of the results of questionnaire and introduction from new PhDs

16:40 Drinks and Bites at the /Pub

18:00 End with some people heading to a restaurant in the city center

The presentation given during the meeting can he found here
